title: DevMate – AI Productivity Platform
description: AI-powered productivity platform that enables natural voice-to-voice interaction with multiple tools. DevMate provides agentic workflows for web search, YouTube summarization, stock prices, currency conversion, and document-based(multi format files like .png, .pdf, .pptx etc) Q&A, with support for downloadable AI-generated outputs.

title: AI Resume Matching System (HR Bot)
description: LLM-powered resume matching system designed for HR screening workflows. The system semantically matches resumes against job descriptions using Boolean logic, embeddings, and MongoDB, significantly improving shortlisting accuracy and reducing manual screening effort.

title: MediBot – RAG-based Medical Assistant
description: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system that answers medical queries using scraped and preprocessed domain-specific data. MediBot combines semantic search with LLM-based reasoning to deliver accurate, low-latency responses over large unstructured datasets.

title: Face Recognition Attendance Management System
description: Computer vision-based attendance management system that performs real-time face detection and recognition to automate attendance tracking. The system prevents proxy attendance and maintains high recognition accuracy across diverse lighting and image conditions.
